Detailed Description

JCOP Framework Access Control library

This component of the JCOP Framework implements Access Control mechanisms that can be used by users in their projects.

The functions are grouped in the following sections

  • General-Purpose functions
  • Privilege-management functions
  • Domain-management functions
  • Group-management functions
  • User-management functions
  • Private functions
